posts.title: The 2025 Local Growth Stack
posts.excerpt: A practical breakdown of the channels, systems, and metrics that compound local growth.
posts.author: Carolina Growth Team
posts.body: Local growth in 2025 requires a tight loop between visibility, conversion, and retention. Start with a technical SEO baseline, build conversion-ready landing pages, and layer paid media for consistent demand. Track lead quality, not just volume, and build nurture sequences that keep prospects warm between touchpoints.

posts.title: How to Fix Conversion Leaks
posts.excerpt: Identify the three most common drop-offs and how to patch them fast.
posts.author: Carolina Growth Team
posts.body: Conversion leaks usually hide in unclear messaging, slow load times, and misaligned CTAs. Start with a page speed audit, tighten your value proposition, and ensure every section points to a single next step. Then use session replays to confirm user intent.
